mapper.select:
/* 업무별 통합테스트현황 */ SELECT A.BZCD AS BZCD , A.BZNM AS BZNM , A.SQN_CD AS SQN_CD , A.SQN_NM AS SQN_NM , B.TOT_CNT AS TOT_CNT , B.AF_TOT_CNT AS AF_TOT_CNT , B.CMPL_CNT AS CMPL_CNT , B.AF_CMPL_CNT AS AF_CMPL_CNT , B.NCMPL_CNT AS NCMPL_CNT , B.PRNR_RT AS PRNR_RT , C.TOT_CNT AS TOT_CNT1 , C.CMPL_CNT AS CMPL_CNT1 , C.NCMPL_CNT AS NCMPL_CNT1 , C.PRNR_RT AS PRNR_RT1 , D.TOT_CNT AS PL_TOT_CNT , D.CMPL_CNT AS PL_CMPL_CNT , D.NCMPL_CNT AS PL_NCMPL_CNT , D.PRNR_RT AS PL_PRNR_RT , F.TOT_CNT AS TOT_CNT2 , F.CMPL_CNT AS CMPL_CNT2 FROM (SELECT A.DTLS_TYCD AS BZCD , A.DTLS_TYNM AS BZNM , B.SQN_CD AS SQN_CD , NVL(C.SQN_NM,'1차수') AS SQN_NM FROM pms_cd_del_mng A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BZCD ,SQN_CD FROM pms_itg_tst_mng WHERE SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} GROUP BY BZCD, SQN_CD) B ON B.BZCD = A.DTLS_TYCD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD AS SQN_CD ,DTLS_TYNM AS SQN_NM FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE GRP_TYCD = '1000000006' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id}) C ON B.SQN_CD = C.SQN_CD WHERE GRP_TYCD = '1000000001' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT AA.BZCD , AA.SQN_CD , AA.TOT_CNT , AA.AF_TOT_CNT , AA.CMPL_CNT , AA.AF_CMPL_CNT , AA.NCMPL_CNT , NVL2(AA.TOT_CNT,ROUND((((AA.CMPL_CNT + AA.AF_CMPL_CNT)/AA.TOT_CNT) * 100), 2),0) AS PRNR_RT FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.SQN_CD , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.FRCS_END_DT <= #{inp_date} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS AF_TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.FRCS_END_DT <= #{inp_date} AND A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('200', '300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CMPL_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.FRCS_END_DT > #{inp_date} AND A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('200', '300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS AF_CMPL_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.FRCS_END_DT <= #{inp_date} AND A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('000', '100') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS NCMPL_CNT FROM pms_itg_tst_mng A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} GROUP BY A.BZCD, A.SQN_CD ) AA ) B ON B.BZCD = A.BZCD AND B.SQN_CD = A.SQN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BB.BZCD , BB.SQN_CD , BB.TOT_CNT , BB.CMPL_CNT , BB.NCMPL_CNT , NVL2(BB.TOT_CNT, ROUND(((BB.CMPL_CNT/BB.TOT_CNT) * 100), 2),0) AS PRNR_RT FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.SQN_CD , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('200', '300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CMPL_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('000', '100') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS NCMPL_CNT FROM pms_itg_tst_mng A WHERE 1=1 AND A.FRCS_END_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL -6 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND #{inp_date} AND A.SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} GROUP BY A.BZCD, A.SQN_CD ) BB ) C ON C.BZCD = A.BZCD AND C.SQN_CD = A.SQN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CC.BZCD , CC.SQN_CD , CC.TOT_CNT , CC.CMPL_CNT , CC.NCMPL_CNT , NVL2(CC.TOT_CNT,ROUND(((CC.CMPL_CNT/CC.TOT_CNT) * 100), 2),0) AS PRNR_RT FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.SQN_CD , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CMPL_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('000', '100','200') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS NCMPL_CNT FROM pms_itg_tst_mng A WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(A.DVLPE_CNF_DT,INTERVAL CAST(#{proc_days} AS INT) DAY),'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL -6 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND #{inp_date} AND A.SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} GROUP BY A.BZCD, A.SQN_CD ) CC ) D ON D.BZCD = A.BZCD AND D.SQN_CD = A.SQN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DD.BZCD , DD.SQN_CD , DD.TOT_CNT , DD.CMPL_CNT FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.SQN_CD , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.ITG_TST_PRC_CD IN ('200','300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CMPL_CNT FROM pms_itg_tst_mng A WHERE 1=1 AND A.FRCS_END_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL 7 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} GROUP BY A.BZCD, A.SQN_CD ) DD ) F ON F.BZCD = A.BZCD AND F.SQN_CD = A.SQN_CD
WHERE 1=1 AND A.BZCD = #{bzcd} ORDER BY A.BZCD, A.SQN_CD
